description:
I've tried a lot of file browsers, Most are missing essential features like search (not by file name, search date rande and file type an location for eg.)
Still a bit buggy in standard Ubuntu 20.04. For example cant resize search result columbs well. Still the only file managent tool i have tried that can actually manage a file system though. Nautilus, Dolphin, Catfish etc etc should all take note.
summary: Best File browser and search by far. Still very buggy

description: Ищет только с таким условием, например; *.doc, выпечка.doc, а вот чтобы просто по клюсевому слову выпечка это приложение искать не хочет. Удалил.
